original_body_lines: The Residencies, Kotte, by ICC, is progressing at a remarkable pace, with construction on track to be completed by the end of 2025. This ambitious timeline reflects ICC’s unwavering commitment to maintaining its Construction Master Schedule (CMS), ensuring that every phase of the project is executed with precision and efficiency. By adhering to this strict schedule, ICC not only upholds its reputation for construction excellence but also maintains the trust of apartment owners who have invested in this prestigious development.

The recent topping up of the second tower marks a significant milestone, as both towers of this G +21 floors twin tower project have now reached their structural completion ahead of schedule. This rapid progress, achieved just months after the first tower was completed, showcases ICC’s expertise in delivering large-scale projects without compromising quality. The ability to meet construction milestones consistently reflects the company’s dedication to transparency and reliability, key factors in retaining the confidence of those who have purchased apartments.

With 234 apartment units spread across two acres of lush landscape, The Residencies offers a unique blend of modern residential spaces. Its rapid construction progress and adherence to schedule ensure that apartment owners and future residents can look forward to moving into their homes as planned, knowing that ICC’s standards of quality and commitment are being upheld.

The project’s sales success has also been remarkable, with all two-bedroom apartments already sold out. This demand underscores the development’s appeal as a prime investment opportunity and a desirable living space. As The Residencies, Kotte moves towards completion, it is set to redefine luxury living in the city, offering a perfect balance of contemporary design, comfort, and convenience in a thriving urban environment.
